text: The Inn of the Sixth Happiness is a 1958 British biographical drama movie directed by Oscar nominated director Mark Robson and based on the 1957 novel The Small Woman by Alan Burgess. It stars Ingrid Bergman, Curt JÃ¼rgens, Robert Donat, Athene Seyeler, Moultrie Kelsall, Burt Kwouk and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1958 drama movies Category:1950s biographical movies Category:British biographical movies Category:British drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Mark Robson
title: The Inn of the Sixth Happiness
